sense.def:
A spark
je droben svetleč košček goreče snovi, ki odleti v zrak iz ognja.

seg.quote: The fire sent smoke and sparks over the top of the fence.

sense.def:
A spark
je tudi kratek blisk, ki ga povzroči elektrika.

A spark of feeling
je majhen, vendar opazen izraz čustva.

seg.quote: A faint spark of pleasure came into his eyes.

sense.def:
Kadar ena stvar
sparks another
ali
sparks it off
, sproži drugo.

seg.quote: The crisis was sparked by the assassination of the duke.
The letter sparked off a friendship between the two men.
